meanings.sent1: Her unique stylizations of the characters brought the story to life.
meanings.sent2: The artist's stylizations of nature were admired by many.
meanings.sent3: The stylizations in the painting made the trees look like they were dancing.
meanings.sent4: His bold stylizations transformed the mundane into the extraordinary.
meanings.sent5: The stylizations in the design added a touch of elegance.

meanings.sent1: The film's stylizations gave it a distinct visual appeal.
meanings.sent2: The stylizations in the fashion show were modern and sleek.
meanings.sent3: The cake's stylizations made it almost too beautiful to eat.
meanings.sent4: The stylizations of the building made it stand out in the cityscape.
meanings.sent5: The stylizations of the logo reflected the company's innovative spirit.
